channel.title: The Haunting of Himbo House (One Shot)
channel.description:
**Game 2 of my Spooktober Saturdays Series**
**For the first 48 hours please only RSVP if you are not already registered in another one of the Spooktober Saturday games.**
You are a big, sexy, kind-hearted himbo (of any gender you choose). You and your fellow himbos have been tasked with staying overnight in a haunted house. Will you make it through the night?
**System**: Himbos of Myth and Mettle by Max Wellander. Rules will be taught and reference items provided.
**Vibe**: Campy spooky
**Possible content warnings**: Ghosts, monsters, death. Safety tools will be in play.
**Breaks**: On the hour or as required
**Session Length**: 3 hours
**Venue**: Discord
**Recording**: Only with everyone's agreement and permission
**Safety Tools**: Lines and Veils, X-Card, Open Table, and other/additional tools to suit the players
This event will follow the Community Code of Conduct
[date=2022-10-08 time=09:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/Edmonton"]
https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NCMgF71qBhkV3IHZ_rf
